reason: Good natural question about advertising/sponsorship for teachers. Answer accurately reflects page 288 Q2/A2 prohibition on advertising and sponsorship income with correct legal references. Source text verified.
Good practical question about uploading student videos to YouTube. Answer accurately covers consent requirements, documentation, and procedures from page 288 Q3/A3. Source text verified.
Duplicate question with q_4_0596 (both ask about uploading student videos to YouTube). Overlapping answer content covering the same consent/blurring/deletion requirements.
Duplicate question with q_4_0594 from batch 0170 (both ask about vlog filming during work hours). Same source content, same answer substance with excessive verbosity.
Duplicate question with q_4_0595 (both ask about receiving money/goods for advertising via internet media). Same source content, excessively verbose answer repeating the same prohibition.

Duplicate topic with q_4_0596 and q_4_0597 (student consent for videos). Excessively verbose answer covering Q3-Q5 from page 288 in a single entry. Much of the detail (e.g. about minors under 14) appears hallucinated beyond source.
Clear question about prohibited items under compliance rules. Answer correctly quotes items 다 and 라 from page 288 준수할 사항 (계속) with proper legal references. Source text verified.
Duplicate with q_4_0601. Nearly identical question (준수할 사항 계속에서 금지되는 행위) and identical answer content, same source text.

Meaningless question: 관련 질의·응답을 하려면 어떻게 해야 하나요 treats the section title as a procedural task. Answer is a broken raw dump of all Q1-Q5 with formatting errors (Q1 question text prepended to every answer).

Meaningless question: 관련 질의·응답을 신청할 때 (when applying for Q&A) is nonsensical. Duplicate with q_4_0605 (identical answer dump). Same broken formatting with Q1 text incorrectly prepended to all answers.
